creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red with yellow orange, white; front: red and orange ribbed double weave small geometric design with supplementary discontinuous weft bordersl; two figures applied using white shells and buttons; back: red ribbed weave with small designs using supplementary discontinued weft; center, 1.25" band of smaller designs, red, yellow, orange, green; front and back all one piece; sides edged in a half round white braid forming shoulder strap; red wool pompoms with long cotton and synthetic tassels decorate sides and bottom corners
dimension:
12 x 11 1/2 in. (30.48 x 29.21 cm)
34 in. (86.36 cm) (object part, strap)
19 in. (48.26 cm) (object part, tassels)
medium: Cotton, wool, synthetic, shell; woven fabric; needlework
title: Kachin Bag
